name: Panic! at the House Party
description:
made for Weekly Game Jam 106 "Oh No!"

    Your parents are away for the weekend, and you've got the house to yourself. You throw a small party for you and your friends, but you get a text from your mother telling you they're coming home early. Oh no! You have to quickly clean up the house and get your friends out of there before your parents get home. Can you make it in time?

Credits:

Code / Art - themousery

Pixel Speech Bubbles - https://pixelspeechbubble.com/

Font - Weilholmir Pixel Font by JustFredrik (https://justfredrik.itch.io/weiholmir)

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Cheery Monday", "Exhilarate", "Who Likes to Party" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
